Context: Today, Katy wants to go on the swings in the playground. But to get to the playground she knows she has to pass old Mr. Jones' house. Mr. Jones has a nasty fierce dog, and every time Katy walks past the house the dog jumps up at the gate and barks. It scares Katy awfully, and she hates walking past the house because of the nasty dog. But Katy does so want to play on the swings. Katy's mother asks her, "Do you want to go out to the playground?" Katy says, "No".

  choice: tired
  choice: bored
  choice: scared
